feed.title: North East Margaree - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 5:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 4 over the Highlands. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 4 over the Highlands. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5 except minus 11 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 5 except minus 11 over the Highlands. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
